title: sickER B*stards
description: The sequel to Sick B*stardsWARNING: THIS IS AN EXTREME HORROR NOVEL. There is gore. There is bad language. There are scenes of a sexual nature. This book is not for you.Home truths pave the way for a journey of self-discovery and revenge in the direct sequel to Matt Shaw's Sick Bastards.
author: Matt Shaw
